Docs.summary: Represents a currency value ranging from -2 63 (or -922,337,203,685,477.5808) to 2 63 -1 (or +922,337,203,685,477.5807) with an accuracy to a ten-thousandth of currency unit to be stored in or retrieved from a database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The actual value of the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney> object is stored in <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney.Value%2A>.
